metadata.name: Important Scheduled Task Deleted/Disabled
metadata.comment: Detects when adversaries stop services or processes by deleting or disabling their respective scheduled tasks in order to conduct data destructive activities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM scheduled_job_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND (lower(LOWER(metadata.event_code)) in (4699, 4701)) AND (contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\windows\\systemrestore\\sr')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\windows\\windows defender\\')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\windows\\bitlocker')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\windows\\windowsbackup\\')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\windows\\windowsupdate\\')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\windows\\updateorchestrator\\schedule')) OR contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\windows\\exploitguard'))) AND NOT (metadata.event_code = 4699 AND endswith(lower(job.user.name), lower('$')) AND contains(lower(job.name), lower('\\windows\\windows defender\\'))))

output.summary: Detects when adversaries stop services or processes by deleting or disabling their respective scheduled tasks in order to conduct data destructive activities
